item.title: Solve root can't access server after change password in digital ocean
item.description: Digital ocean is a cloud platform that really nailed their Developer Experience (DX). One of the most frustrating thing as a developer is taking care of server or dev ops stuff. Today I can’t access my server at all through SSH. There are many problem that can caused this. Let’s see each one of them with solution Forget your root/user password If you just forget you root or user password. Log in to your Digital Ocean account go to your droplet Choose ‘access’ in tab Reset root password
